name: Dotnet CLI
description: Installs .NET SDK, which includes the .NET CLI and the shared runtime. Offers options to install multiple SDK versions.

version.description: Version of .NET SDK to install. Use 'latest' for the latest version, 'lts' for the latest LTS version, 'X.Y' or 'X.Y.Z' for a specific version.

additionalVersions.description: Comma-separated list of additional .NET SDK versions to install. Use 'latest' for the latest version, 'lts' for the latest LTS version, 'X.Y' or 'X.Y.Z' for a specific version.
